title: My List of PS Games.
click_on_videogame: Click on a game below to learn more

Transformers Fall of Cybertron.description: My first platinum. I practiced my English by playing multiplayer. Good game, LET THE REMASTERED VERSION OUT!

Sherlock Holmes Crimes and Punishments.description: It was a gift for my dad but the first case didn't even happen.

Call of Duty Black Ops 2.description: Good times with my brother in online multiplayer, bad times with my sister when she used the internet. Good story and secrets, predicted what 2025 would be like O.M.G.

Destiny.description: Good times, I finished two rounds by myself (3 vs AI game mode).

GTA V.description: Good and bad moments in Online mode, craziness and crews, very toxic.

Need for Speed Rivals.description: Driving non-stop, I fell in love with the Ferrari F12 Berlinetta.

GTA IV.description: It was good, the online not much, many secrets that I overlooked.

Uncharted 1 Drake's Fortune.description: Good game, the part about the demons in an abandoned Nazi bunker and me alone scared me.

Uncharted 2 Among Thieves.description: Good game, many secrets, reach the final boss on the maximum difficulty... Fucking Lazarevic.

God of War Collection (1 y 2).description: Good games, violence and blood on demand, I still remember the combos... Fucking Zeus and Ares.

Call of Duty Ghosts.description: Underrated, good online games with my brother, to the point where we were only 2 vs 6 or 8, we won in the end.

Street Fighter 4.description: Damn final boss, he used all the combos of all the characters, and also in easy mode with Zangief.

Call of Duty Advance Warfare.description: The same as the previous ones but more futuristic, more frenetic, double jump, etc.

Assassin's Creed III.description: With this game I learned about the history of the independence of the United States of America... more or less.

The Last of Us.description: This is Cinema. Excellent plot, suspense, terror, good and sad moments, everything. I'm not surprised they made a series of this game.

Minecraft.description: I played it a bit on Ps3 and more on PC, but I gave it up after a few months.

God of War III.description: Zeus!, your son has returned and brings with him the destruction of Olympus!

Call of Duty Black Ops.description: Great piece of game, except that it gets stuck or bugged in a certain cinematic.

Resistance 3.description: I've already played it twice, I can't get enough of playing it, now I'm about to get the platinum.

Battlefield Hardline.description: Cops and robbers game, eighties-type plot... but it's the same as other FPS war games, shooting the bad guys.

DOOM Eternal.description: The most Christian/Catholic game that could have existed, father of FPS. It's a monster movie where YOU are the monster, 10/10.

Batman Arkham Asylum.description: It changes the face of superhero games, 10/10, GOTY. A manual on how to create and develop a good superhero game.

Batman Arkham City.description: An prison-city full of criminals and psychopats making un chaos in every corner... just another night for Batman.

Batman Arkham Knight.description: What should have been the LAST game in the Arkham trilogy, the finishing touch... but then came Suicide Squad: Kill The Justice League and Rocksteady screwed up big time.

Uncharted 3 Drake's Deception.description: More secrets, another lost city, more about protagonist's past and... an deception.

Uncharted 4 A Thief's End.description: An perfect final for an perfect saga and for his main character.

Days Gone.description: Good game but with an few of incomplete parts in one of their enviroments, this post-apocalyptic world is coming for you.

Red Dead Redemption 2.description: Excellent game, drama, shootings, tensions, cowboys, deceptions, plot twists... makes me want to play it again.

Horizon Zero Dawn.description: One of the first games for Play Station 4, good graphics, good creativity and enviroment.

Call of Duty Black Ops Cold War.description: The story happens between Black Ops 1 and Black Ops 2, secrets, spies, more than one final (depends on player's decisions).

Call of Duty Black Ops III.description: Only good for frenetic online multiplayer and zombies, but the campaing... 5/10.

Call of Duty Modern Warfare (2019).description: An excellent game to reboot the saga, with realistic details and an story to get you out of your chair.

Call of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Remastered.description: The game who caused controversy for just one mission, but remember... No Russian.

God of War 2018.description: 10/10, GOTY, good soundtrack, good story and moments of nostagia BOY!

Just Cause 3.description: An game about explosions, overthrow a dictator, explosions and... explosions.
